blocker.description: Playwright MCP browser automation tools are not available in the current environment
blocker.impact: Cannot execute any UI validation tests - browser navigation, element interaction, and screenshot capture are impossible

test_results.test_name: FE: Show remaining air tickets when balance is on hold due to booking request

navigation.hinted_path: Settings > Workflows > Create New > Air Tickets Auto Encashment Recipe
navigation.path_correction_note: Unable to validate - Playwright MCP tools not available

test_results.notes: Test requires browser automation to navigate to Employee Benefits > Air Tickets and verify remaining ticket balance display. Cannot proceed without Playwright MCP integration.

test_results.test_name: Client is unable to remove Processed Air tickets

test_results.notes: Test requires complex workflow: navigate to Work Expenses > Air Tickets, verify reject/delete options are disabled for processed tickets, reopen payroll month, reject transaction, verify options become enabled. Cannot proceed without Playwright MCP integration.

test_results.test_name: Need to remove processed (Encashment) Air tickets with Payroll reopen

navigation.hinted_path: Settings > Workflows > Create New > Air Tickets Auto Encashment Recipe
navigation.path_correction_note: Unable to validate - Playwright MCP tools not available

test_results.notes: Test requires complex workflow: verify processed air ticket encashment in closed payroll month, reopen payroll, delete transaction, verify request returns to pending, reassign to different period. Cannot proceed without Playwright MCP integration.

instructions: Add Playwright MCP server to .mcp.json configuration
Restart Claude Code to load the Playwright MCP integration
Re-run validation with Playwright tools available
resolution_required.documentation: https://github.com/executeautomation/mcp-playwright or similar Playwright MCP server implementation
